scenes.description: Ouro Kronii performs the song 'Charles' by Keina Suda.
Kronii talks to the audience post-performance and demonstrates various poses.
A host version of Kronii speaks from a podium, announcing a commercial break and the next guest.
A transition screen featuring a loading animation with a chibi character.
Introduction of 'Funnyronii', a comedic persona appearing through a portal.

subtitles.original: シャルル
subtitles.english: Charles

subtitles.original: 愛を謳って 謳って 雲の上
subtitles.english: Singing of love, of love, above the clouds

subtitles.original: 濁って 濁って 夜の群れ
subtitles.english: Muddy, muddy, the crowd of night

subtitles.original: さよなら さよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye, goodbye

subtitles.original: Hah... okay.
subtitles.english: Hah... okay.

subtitles.original: Um, I hope you guys liked that.
subtitles.english: Um, I hope you guys liked that.

subtitles.original: Uh, that was... that was pretty tiring, but...
subtitles.english: Uh, that was... that was pretty tiring, but...

subtitles.original: Yeah, uh, I'd like to think that I did my best,
subtitles.english: Yeah, uh, I'd like to think that I did my best,

subtitles.original: so hopefully I can, uh...
subtitles.english: so hopefully I can, uh...

subtitles.original: maybe be considered to- to win? I don't know.
subtitles.english: maybe be considered to- to win? I don't know.

subtitles.original: Oh, um, do you guys want to see some- some poses, I- I guess?
subtitles.english: Oh, um, do you guys want to see some- some poses, I- I guess?

subtitles.original: Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: Odd request, but I'll- I'll try. Okay.
subtitles.english: Odd request, but I'll- I'll try. Okay.

subtitles.original: Glowing, so... um, let's see.
subtitles.english: Glowing, so... um, let's see.

subtitles.original: Uh, what kind of pose do you want?
subtitles.english: Uh, what kind of pose do you want?

subtitles.original: Um, like- like this? Like maybe maybe a little bit like that?
subtitles.english: Um, like- like this? Like maybe maybe a little bit like that?

subtitles.original: I don't really know.
subtitles.english: I don't really know.

subtitles.original: Like, maybe like this?
subtitles.english: Like, maybe like this?

subtitles.original: I'm not really sure what you guys want.
subtitles.english: I'm not really sure what you guys want.

subtitles.original: Like that? Happy?
subtitles.english: Like that? Happy?

subtitles.original: Maybe? Is this- is this good?
subtitles.english: Maybe? Is this- is this good?

subtitles.original: Uh, one- one last one?
subtitles.english: Uh, one- one last one?

subtitles.original: Um, I already- I already- I already did one.
subtitles.english: Um, I already- I already- I already did one.

subtitles.original: Yeah, that's- that's it. That's- that's all from me.
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's- that's it. That's- that's all from me.

subtitles.original: I'm gonna- I'm gonna go now. Okay.
subtitles.english: I'm gonna- I'm gonna go now. Okay.

subtitles.original: Get this camera out of my face. Okay, bye.
subtitles.english: Get this camera out of my face. Okay, bye.

subtitles.original: Thank you very much, Miss Kronii, for that amazing song.
subtitles.english: Thank you very much, Miss Kronii, for that amazing song.

subtitles.original: Your singing definitely has captured our hearts.
subtitles.english: Your singing definitely has captured our hearts.

subtitles.original: My heart, in fact, which is the most important one.
subtitles.english: My heart, in fact, which is the most important one.

subtitles.original: And next up, we are going to call the next Kronii up on stage.
subtitles.english: And next up, we are going to call the next Kronii up on stage.

subtitles.original: And let's all give her a warm round of applause.
subtitles.english: And let's all give her a warm round of applause.

subtitles.original: Oh, but before we get on with the show,
subtitles.english: Oh, but before we get on with the show,

subtitles.original: we're going to have a bit of a commercial break.
subtitles.english: we're going to have a bit of a commercial break.

subtitles.original: That's right, we are sponsored by... guess who it is?
subtitles.english: That's right, we are sponsored by... guess who it is?

subtitles.original: Yep, you got it. Miss Ouro Kronii.
subtitles.english: Yep, you got it. Miss Ouro Kronii.

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness, what a giving gal.
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness, what a giving gal.

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you so much, Kronii.
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you so much, Kronii.

subtitles.original: Oh, you're welcome.
subtitles.english: Oh, you're welcome.

subtitles.original: What? Anyway,
subtitles.english: What? Anyway,

subtitles.original: let's get on with the show, with the commercial break! Woohoo!
subtitles.english: let's get on with the show, with the commercial break! Woohoo!

subtitles.original: NOWLOADING...
subtitles.english: NOWLOADING...

subtitles.original: What are you looking at?
subtitles.english: What are you looking at?

subtitles.original: That's right.
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Hey, what is up? I'm here to win!
subtitles.english: Hey, what is up? I'm here to win!

subtitles.original: And you know why? It's because I'm so on point.
subtitles.english: And you know why? It's because I'm so on point.

subtitles.original: BEST Comedian Nronii / Funnyronii
subtitles.english: BEST Comedian Nronii / Funnyronii

subtitles.original: Get it? 'Cause, you know, swords?
subtitles.english: Get it? 'Cause, you know, swords?

subtitles.original: I'm so sharp and witty today.
subtitles.english: I'm so sharp and witty today.

subtitles.original: Hah! I did it again.
subtitles.english: Hah! I did it again.

subtitles.original: Oh man, I'm so silly like that.
subtitles.english: Oh man, I'm so silly like that.

subtitles.original: It's- it's mind-blowing.
subtitles.english: It's- it's mind-blowing.

subtitles.original: How could I get any better than this?
subtitles.english: How could I get any better than this?

subtitles.original: Well, today, I'm gonna be chopping up some fruit
subtitles.english: Well, today, I'm gonna be chopping up some fruit

subtitles.original: and make some fruit salad.
subtitles.english: and make some fruit salad.
